A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I cannot add anything\, what has already been said by those lamenting covers it all. People are telling me STOP PINING FOR LUCAS IT'S NOT LUCAS. Damn right it's not Lucas! Maybe they should stop trying to adhere to his formula...which is stupid because all he does it basic storytelling ( done very well )  yet everything Disney is doing falls short...nothing feels like it has consequences because the cast is constantly explaining the story to the view or cracking poor\, avenger-style humor. \n\nErgh. That's all I'm writing. I hated it.
